name: Fat Boy World
description:
Let yourself drive in Fat Boy World!!!

Drive in this exciting game with full potential of your reflexes!!!

Help him to jump and drive segway through the beautiful worlds of Fat Boy World.
Be careful! There are many obstacles.

They want to stop Fat Boy in each path.
You need to collect a food on the way.

An easy and smooth control makes it very funny and to jump or ride.

Use Super Power button ( bomb with scull ) to destroy all enemy in front of you. But be careful you only have 3 times to use it. After usage you will need some time to recharge, so use it carefully!!!

Instructions:
- Tap to jump.
- Tap and hold to jump longer.
- Tap twice for double jump.
- Use Super Power to destroy enemy in front of you.
